title: Elizabeth's chocolate lover's cake
ingredients: ['Cake', '275g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarb of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '170g baking chocolate, chopped', '125g unsalted butter', '500g dark brown soft sugar', '3 eggs', '1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract', '250ml soured cream', '250ml water', 'Icing', '170g baking chocolate, chopped', '55g unsalted butter', '1 egg yolk', '500g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons double cream', '225g cream cheese, softened', 'Ganache', '350g plain chocolate, chopped', '250ml double cream']
